source:
graph TD
  subgraph UserFlow
    U[User] --> CREATE[Create Event]
    CREATE --> INVITE[Invite Guests]
    INVITE --> VOTE[Vote on Activities]
    VOTE --> RESULT[See Results]
  end

  subgraph Features
    VOTE --> POLL[Activity Polls]
    VOTE --> DATE[Date Picker]
    VOTE --> LOC[Location Vote]
  end

  subgraph Data
    EVENT[(Event DB)] --> POLL
    EVENT --> DATE
    EVENT --> LOC
    RESULT --> EVENT
  end

  subgraph Future
    NOTIF[Notifications]
    REMIND[Reminders]
    SHARE[Share Links]
  end

meta.title: Festsmeden - Party Planner
meta.description: Event creation, voting, and coordination flows
